column5: @jtwatkin pineapple, mushrooms and tomatoes. It is my version of a vegetarian pizza!! It has been my go to for years.

I kicked ass at work this week!! I finished a project on time, within budget and met all of the objectives! The key success strategy? All of the right people in all of the right places! Now, I’m going to rest for a few days.

@JeremyHyde_ @jennysuedempsey @jtwatkin @mikeaoki @stacysherman @BeckyRoemen @ColinShaw_CX @heycxguy @JeremyHyde_ considering the amount of money it costs to hire & train an employee I wonder if employee retention would offset the cost?

@justinmrobbins @jtwatkin @RussLoL @brianrweber @dgingiss @stacysherman @ClareMuscutt @CXAccelerator My new hobby is learning how to remodel & repair my triplex. @jtwatkin mentioned hiring a guide and I agree! Sometimes it is a @YouTube video or a contractor or maybe a book. A guide reduces speed to competency and increases success rates!#cxqotd @justinmrobbins

@jtwatkin @tracardi @NicholasZeisler @seatoncx @CxExcellence @AlexHyphen @jo_simcox @eugenecheang @JoshOnCX @kkmett @jacobshields20 @tanujdiwan @ddu17 @AlexAllwood @rnanjad @knowledgebird @nktripathi101 I have used my experience as an @Airbnb host to understand friction. 1) put urself in CT shoes 2) is ur CX inclusive 3) read reviews 4) address friction points and repeat and repeat and repeat. #cxqotd @jtwatkin

11.9.22 #cxqotd What strategies do you have in place to support frontline employees during the holiday season? ⁦@jtwatkin⁩ ⁦@JeremyHyde_⁩ ⁦@becustomerled1⁩ ⁦@thecallcenterc1⁩ ⁦@heycxguy⁩ https://t.co/L0Q46UbA48

@jtwatkin @SeanBHawkins @JeremyHyde_ @_Glenna_Mae @in_queue @thecallcenterc1 @theccdoctor @tlaird_expivia @NealTopf @TomRichard11 @jacobshields20 @dbeaumont266 @TWGator71 @GregOrtbach The process you outlined @jtwatkin is similar to the processes we have used. Hiring unqualified folks is just too expensive. CX is negatively impacted, team morale negatively impacted and it is a disservice to the employee.

@jtwatkin @WFMintern @in_queue @theccdoctor @SeanBHawkins @thecallcenterc1 @_Glenna_Mae @justinmrobbins @bradcleveland @tlaird_expivia @NealTopf @LeslieO @Patrick_SaaS @TomRichard11 @jacobshields20 Most of us don’t think about work avoidance during training. It’s a thing. Not completing eLearning, going off camera and unresponsive, lots of loooong breaks, “tech issues, and many more! @jtwatkin
There aren’t words big enough to describe this; @joshgad disgusted is a good place to start. Let’s send a message to Javier! You have another friend here! Please join me and send some love!

@jtwatkin @jennysuedempsey @mikeaoki @RoyAtkinson @heycxguy @becustomerled1 @globaldenton @stephaniethum @esmancuso @DebbieSzumylo @_Glenna_Mae @Hyken @AlexAllwood Your not crazy @jtwatkin! Eating slowly is a proven technique to solve those issues. The challenge is to slow down and remain present while eating in todays busy world.
I am on social media for the reasons you mentioned @jtwatkin. I like to connect and learn with other CX and L&D geeks!

Great question @jtwatkin!! This would be an interesting research project. My gut reaction says yes in some circles folks are encouraged to be aggressive. However, personal responsibility is still in play. What steps can we take to lessen the impact on agents? @robconnellyvis1
@CXAccelerator It is also a sign that they are in need of an LXD team. Drinking from a fire hose is also a sign of a poorly designed learning experience.

@JeremyHyde_ @SeanBHawkins @jtwatkin @mikeaoki @ChatsFires @jacobshields20 @CxExcellence @thecallcenterc1 @mattbeckwith @justinmrobbins @theccdoctor @dbeaumont266 Great idea! Yes, I was a volunteer instructor for the ATD conference for years. It is a great resource albeit a bit expensive for entry level wage earners.

#CXQOTD Are you partnering with your Learning & Dev team to ensure they are supporting ur CX initiatives? @jtwatkin @mikeaoki @ChatsFires @JeremyHyde_ @jacobshields20 @CxExcellence @thecallcenterc1 @mattbeckwith https://t.co/lSLNCeUV3r
@jennysuedempsey Caring for yourself is never ignorant. A friend of mine has reminded me many times that self care, in all of its forms, is always the right thing to do.
@jennysuedempsey Feedback is necessary for growth. The role these orgs play during the most stressful time in somebody’s life is impactful. Please provide feedback.

#CXQOTD Todays question is “how do we balance inclusive CX initiatives with business needs? Providing inclusive  customer service is a balancing act. Let’s discuss how to provide an inclusive experience! ⁦@jtwatkin⁩ ⁦@CXAccelerator⁩ ⁦@JeremyHyde_⁩ https://t.co/GPIdt3BN5G

@LukeCXEX @jtwatkin @YemiPenn @SeanMcGinn8 @AilsDay @billquiseng @CXpert @jennysuedempsey @CustomerIsFirst @annettefranz One of my team members lost their spouse recently. I created a work schedule that met his needs, raised money for him & made space to meet as needed. This level of support was the reason he returned to work. Human beings first; human doings second. Always. #cxqotd
@jtwatkin @LukeCXEX @YemiPenn @SeanMcGinn8 @AilsDay @billquiseng @CXpert @jennysuedempsey @CustomerIsFirst @annettefranz @stacysherman You are speaking my language @jtwatkin
@jtwatkin Me! And now I have a new kitty that insists on sleeping in my lap. @jtwatkin

@jtwatkin @Danielal007 @CXpert @theccdoctor @tlaird_expivia @michelleRPO @NealTopf @AilsDay @LukeCXEX @zjellson @avdingus @CustomerIsFirst @globaldenton @ddu17 @AlexAllwood @dbeaumont266 I agree with @Danielal007. Psychological safety is necessary before employees are willing to share feedback. And making it easy as  @jtwatkin shared is also important.

@jtwatkin @robconnellyvis1 @in_queue @SeanMcGinn8 @seatoncx @CxExcellence @cxcentricglobal @eugenecheang @SeanBHawkins @JeremyHyde_ @TomRichard11 @jacobshields20 @esmancuso @thecallcenterc1 @theccdoctor We don’t have an official measure beyond a voice survey. We are expected to take action on feedback rec’d during 1x1s. I am excited by the idea of an ASAT metric!

@jtwatkin @tanujdiwan Great question!! @tanujdiwan! I would find it difficult to remain objective and/or I would demand more from a family or friend. I don’t believe they would want to work for me. Lol. #cxqotd @jtwatkin

@jtwatkin @jennysuedempsey @LukeCXEX @esmancuso @robconnellyvis1 @bmc_consulting @tanujdiwan @Samf_CX_MRX @jaredorr10 @_Glenna_Mae @TomRichard11 @globaldenton @SeanBHawkins @LeslieO Honey mango!! I drive 90 miles round trip for these little bits of heaven!! @jtwatkin #cxqotd

@jtwatkin @mattbikewith @SeanBHawkins @CustomerIsFirst @RoyAtkinson @TomRichard11 @JeremyHyde_ @in_queue @thecallcenterc1 @theccdoctor @NTIatHome @murphyjfraser @Press1ForNick @NealTopf @jtwatkin I agree with everything you said! The challenge is finding orgs & great leaders like you that will foster the environment that u described. Imagine the quality of service in that kind of org! #cxqotd
@jennysuedempsey @LeslieO What a great day! Thank you for sharing @jennysuedempsey!!
@CustomerIsFirst @jtwatkin @JeremyHyde_ @dave_dyson @jennysuedempsey @Officevibe Thanks @CustomerIsFirst I am going to check them out!

4.27.22 CXQOTD Have you created a psychologically safe environment that encourages feedback from your frontline agents. If so, how are you capturing the feedback and taking action? @jtwatkin @JeremyHyde_ @dave_dyson @CustomerIsFirst @jennysuedempsey https://t.co/65AgXH7qMg
4.20.22 #CXQOTD What strategies do you use to create employee engagement? @jtwatkin https://t.co/I4opRuUGwL
@mikeaoki As usual we are aligned @mikeaoki !
4.13.22 #CXQOTD How do you inspire agents to do their best work? @jtwatkin @jennysuedempsey @mikeaoki @LeslieO @CustomerIsFirst https://t.co/88pR3j1XhR
@Schulbz @jtwatkin @jennysuedempsey @JeremyHyde_ @dave_dyson @tanujdiwan @CXpert @jacobshields20 @heycxguy Love this list!

@RoyAtkinson @jtwatkin @jennysuedempsey @JeremyHyde_ @dave_dyson Yessss!!! Authenticity is a must @RoyAtkinson. Folks know when you are phoning it in! Include everyone and treat folks as individuals are key success strategies to create a sense of belonging. Thank you for sharing ur insight!
@billquiseng Can I just say…ditto? This list is beautiful!

@jtwatkin @jennysuedempsey @JeremyHyde_ @dave_dyson @tanujdiwan @Schulbz @CXpert @jacobshields20 @heycxguy Yes!! @Google designed their campus to create “casual collisions” including slow elevators & food only 150 ft away to inspire collaboration. I wonder if it also created a sense of belonging?
@JeremyHyde_ Thank you @JeremyHyde_ !! Appreciation is an effective strategy to create a sense of belonging and only takes a few moments out of the day.

@jtwatkin @jennysuedempsey @JeremyHyde_ @dave_dyson @tanujdiwan @Schulbz @CXpert @jacobshields20 @heycxguy @jtwatkin thank you for reminding us that belonging doesn’t have to be complicated just intentional.
#CXQOTD Please list 3 strategies that you use to create a sense of belonging in the workplace. @jtwatkin @jennysuedempsey @JeremyHyde_ @dave_dyson https://t.co/H7ZqA94Hm0
@jennysuedempsey I’m so sorry @jennysuedempsey!
@CustomerIsFirst I agree @CustomerIsFirst!!
Wayfair is officially an AARP approved employer! This designation indicates commitment to hiring and supporting a multi-generational workforce! Way to go @Wayfair!!

@CustomerIsFirst I am onboarding an assistant manager right now and I built in plenty of desk/reflection time into her schedule. A great way to provide time for her to learn/reflect and ensure she isn’t drinking from a fire hose.

@kkmett @jtwatkin @dnm54 @EJEngwall @LeslieO @jimtincher @stacysherman @shanegold @CustomerIsFirst @mentalmarketer @scottdraeger @KristaSheridan @JuliaAhlfeldt @Schulbz @RussLoL Do you have any suggestions on how to explore this topic? I think I am going to look for a course @coursera and maybe read a book @CustomerIsFirst suggested a few years ago.
How did you get started in CX and what are you passionate about in this space? #cxquotd @jtwatkin
Yes! Cheese in all its forms is the only reason I am unable to join the vegan lifestyle. Life without cheese doesn't make sense to me. Nice to see you @jennysuedempsey #cxquotd

I review my calendar every Sunday evening. The 1st step is to remove unnecessary meetings & combine meetings if possible. I schedule 4 hrs of flow time as well & guard that time w/my life. Lol. Silencing Slack for a few hrs a week is imperative as well. #cxqotd
As I am listening to @CustomerIsFirst I wonder how we inspire agents to offer empathy when they are at unprecedented levels of exhaustion? #cxday @OfficiumLabs

Happy International CX Day! @CustomerIsFirst is on fire as he discussed how to keep our agents safe during this unprecedented time in customer service. Thank you @OfficiumLabs for this great virtual conference.
Scrolling through Instagram & read this great idea only to realize it was my great idea! Thank you @icmicallcenter https://t.co/a2hvwKCQtn
I am looking forward to joining @LeslieO for this informative and insightful conversation!
Joins us next week! Registration link below!
@jennysuedempsey @LeslieO Yes hope to see you there @jennysuedempsey
I am looking forward to joining @LeslieO next week!! Will you join us? Registration link below!

Check in as a human being first and a human doing second. You should know what’s important to them outside of work.
Tie the performance review to their career development goals.
Ask for feedback on ur performance as a leader.
Offer support. #cxqotd @jtwatkin

@jtwatkin @TomRichard11 @cx_scott @Patrick_SaaS @SeanBHawkins @LeslieO @esmancuso @thecallcenterc1 @theccdoctor @mrpatto @_Glenna_Mae @heycxguy @mikeaoki Well said @jtwatkin! Agents on ur team are so fortunate to have a leader that is committed to their growth.

I couldn’t have said this better myself @murphyjfraser! The only thing I would add is a reminder that creating psychological safety is not a one & done endeavor. It must be tended to each snd every day.
@jennysuedempsey @stacysherman @jtwatkin Thank you @jennysuedempsey
Say it with me "I am worthy now. In this moment. Just as I stand." Thank you @BreneBrown for consistently reminding me of my worthiness. These messages always seem to arrive right on time.
I just enrolled in the UCI CX Certification program! @stacysherman provides a significant discount on her website https://t.co/2Gmn00ivat that made this dream possible!! @jtwatkin I did it!!
@jennysuedempsey @murphyjfraser @jtwatkin @CustomerIsFirst @BeckyRoemen @dave_dyson @JeremyHyde_ Never too late to add value @jennysuedempsey!!
@kkmett @murphyjfraser @jennysuedempsey @jtwatkin @CustomerIsFirst @BeckyRoemen @dave_dyson @JeremyHyde_ Thank you for the @getclockwise tip @kkmett. I am going to use this tool!
@UCMaxine @8x8 @jtwatkin Thank you for sharing @UCMaxine!

@jtwatkin @tanujdiwan @stacysherman @CustomerIsFirst @CXpert @rkirubi @jennysuedempsey @murphyjfraser @kayejchapman @CxExcellence @EJEngwall @esmancuso @LeslieO @justinmrobbins Wow! Insightful & inspiring question @jtwatkin. As I attempt to write a thoughtful response I realize that I haven't been doing this very well. I am going to try some of your suggestions & get back to you. Thank you for inspiring me. #cxqotd
@theccdoctor @stephaniethum @luismelo78 @kkmett @esmancuso @EricaMarois @theccdoctor I am printing your list and taping to my fridge!! #cxqotd
@stephaniethum @luismelo78 @kkmett @esmancuso @EricaMarois @theccdoctor I am a work in progress as well @stephaniethum. Scheduling and taking a lunch hour is the first step for me. #cxqotd

#cxqotd Are you role modeling self care and are you making space for employees to care for themselves? @murphyjfraser @jennysuedempsey @jtwatkin @CustomerIsFirst @BeckyRoemen @dave_dyson @JeremyHyde_ https://t.co/ayh2l9YlTm
@tanujdiwan Increases not creases! Lol. Someday I will learn that multi tasking is not a thing.

@tanujdiwan #cxqotd the thing that keeps me going on tough days is tapping into the opportunity to positively impact team members, peers or customers. Helping others always make creases the quality of my day!
@jeanniecw @cx_scott @dave_dyson @CustomerIsFirst @LeslieO @murphyjfraser @jennysuedempsey @BeckyRoemen @JeremyHyde_ Great idea!
@jeanniecw @cx_scott @dave_dyson @CustomerIsFirst @LeslieO @murphyjfraser @jennysuedempsey @BeckyRoemen @JeremyHyde_ I also use the term “folks” when addressing groups of people. Seems to work well.

@cx_scott @dave_dyson @CustomerIsFirst @LeslieO @murphyjfraser @jennysuedempsey @BeckyRoemen @jeanniecw @JeremyHyde_ I found it @cx_scott! "The most common honorific is the term ‘Mx.’ [said like ‘mix’]." #cxqotd

@dave_dyson @CustomerIsFirst @LeslieO @murphyjfraser @jennysuedempsey @BeckyRoemen @jeanniecw @JeremyHyde_ @dave_dyson friend doesn't feel authentic to me and as you mentioned feels a bit too familiar or sarcastic. #cxqotd
@stephaniethum @skillshare Thank you, @stephaniethum for the share!!

#cxqotd How do we create inclusive greetings in customer service? I added a bonus question as well! @CustomerIsFirst @LeslieO @murphyjfraser @jennysuedempsey @BeckyRoemen @jeanniecw @dave_dyson @JeremyHyde_ https://t.co/hnQVDYHomG
Don't miss this great opportunity to learn from @jeanniecw! I can't wait to take this course! #cx
@jennysuedempsey The truth. Lying breaks trust with my provider and I will never return. A patient has a right to know the pain level so they can prepare.
@jeanniecw Fascinating! Looking forward to learning more @jeanniecw

Great question @jennysuedempsey! This story reminds of grocery stores that dim lights & minimize noise a few mornings a week to create a low sensory environment. The answer isn't delivered groceries the answer is let me have the same options as others!

Thank you for sharing @dbeaumont266 I learned something new as well! This solution is an effective training/coaching tool as well. After the customer is cared for the manager can provide training/coaching to the employee! Win win! #customerservice @Hyken

Accountability is a compassionate response when a promise has been broken, a boundary is violated, or a task is left undone. Thankful for the work I am doing w/@BreneBrown and her sisters on the Unlocking Us podcast @Spotify  #leadership #boundaries #compassion
What have you learned this week? #CXQOTD In this week's question I have quoted greats like @BreneBrown @WillWorkLearn! Enjoy! https://t.co/L5MRfrLiYt
@murphyjfraser @LeslieO I agree with @murphyjfraser! @LeslieO I can't imagine you have ever delivered a boring training session!

A8: Is growth easy? Lol. I have created a study guide for the next 6 months as I prepare for my CX certification. @CXAccelerator will play a role in my growth this year as well. And @jtwatkin @jennysuedempsey @CustomerIsFirst @LeslieO and others! #ICMIchat

A7: I have created cross functional relationships through a genuine commitment to ensure my team & I understand how our work impacts the org. We are great business partners. I have created strong personal relationships along the way as well. #ICMIchat
A6: Effortless service. This new normal is complex and effortless is necessary. Listen, fix the right problem, and fix it the first time. And meet me on the channel of my choice. #ICMIchat
A5: Connect agents to the purpose of their work. Purpose matters. It's not about the broken dresser drawer it's about being an agent of peace in that moment to that customer. #ICMIchat
@JeremyHyde_ Yes! Learning is the work not separate from the work. #ICMIchat
